name: Insectophobia : Episode 1
description: Insectophobia is an episodic platformer. It's the story of John and his struggle against monster insects.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Pentium IV 1 Ghz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Direct X 9.0 compatible graphics card (Geforce FX 5200 or better - ATI Radeon 9200 or better) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 164 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X 9.0 compatible sound card
